features.featureTitle: Remove the PositionEntryForm component from the Dashboard tab (frontend/src/components/DashboardTab.tsx). The form and its associated 'Add Position' UI must no longer be rendered anywhere in the Dashboard tab. The only way to add positions to the dashboard must be via the existing 'Import from Binance' button. Do not remove the PositionEntryForm component file itself â€” only stop rendering it in DashboardTab.tsx.
